entry.title: Tuesday: Snow at times heavy. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Amount 15 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light this morning. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 12 this morning and minus 6 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Tuesday 28 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 9. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries this evening then partly cloudy. Risk of freezing drizzle this evening. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 5 this evening and minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Tuesday 28 February 2023
